column2: "Iyi ekyir no
column3: nna David ne ba Absalom wɔ akyerɛbaa fɛɛfɛw bi a ne dzin dze Tamar; na David ne ba Amnon pɛ no."

column2: "Na Amnon no ho hiahiaa no dodow ma ɔyaree
column3: osian n'akyerɛbaa Tamar ntsi; nna ɔyɛ ɔbaabun; na ɔyɛɛ dzen maa Amnon dɛ ɔbɛyɛ no biribi."

column2: "Na Amnon wɔ nyɛnko bi a ne dzin dze Jonadab
column3: David no nua Simea ba a: na Jonadab yɛ nyimpa a n'enyi atsew dodow."

column2: "Na obisaa no dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔhen ne ba efɔn dɛm daa daa yi? Ana ennkɛka akyerɛ me? Na Amnon see no dɛ
column5: Mepɛ mo nua Absalom n'akyerɛbaa Tamar."

column2: "Na Jonadab see no dɛ
column4: na petuw yar: na sɛ w'egya ba dɛ ɔrobɔhwɛ wo a
column8: na ɔmbɛma me edziban ma mindzi
column9: na ɔnyɛ edziban no wɔ m'enyim
column11: na mindzi no wɔ ne nsamu."

column2: "Nna Amnon kɛdae
column3: na opetuwii yaree: na aber a ɔhen no baa dɛ ɔrobɔhwɛ no no
column7: na ɔmbɛyɛ tatar ebien bi wɔ m'enyim mma me

column2: "Nna David somae ma wɔkɔr Tamar hɔ wɔ fie
column4: Kɔ wo nua Amnon fie seseiara

column2: "Nna Tamar sii mu kɔr no nua Amnon fie; nna ɔda. Na ɔfaa mbɔr fetsewee
"Na ɔfaa kyesɛn no na ohuee no wɔ n'enyim; na ɔammpɛ dɛ odzi. Na Amnon see dɛ
column3: Ma nyimpa nyinara mfi me nkyɛn mpue. Na wopuei

column2: "Na Amnon see Tamar dɛ
column3: Fa edziban no bra pia mu
column4: ma mindzi no wɔ wo nsamu. Na Tamar faa tatar no a ɔyɛe no
column5: na ɔdze brɛɛ no nua Amnon wɔ pia mu."

column2: "Na aber a ɔdze piin ne nkyɛn dɛ ondzi no
"Na obuaa no dɛ
column5: mma nnhyɛ me; na wɔnnyɛ dɛm adze yi wɔ Israel: mma nnyɛ nkwaseadze yi."

column2: "Na emi dze
column3: henfa na morosoa m'enyimguase mafa? Na ɔwo dze
column4: ebɛyɛ dɛ Israel mu nkwasea no bi. Dɛm ntsi afei
column6: kɛka kyerɛ ɔhen; na ɔnnkɛfa me akam wo."

column2: "Naaso ɔammpɛ dɛ otsie ne ndze: na ɔnam dɛ no ho yɛ dzen sen no ntsi
"Nna Amnon dze tan kɛse mbordo taan no; na tan a ɔdze taan no no yɛɛ kɛse sen ɔdɔ a ɔdze dɔɔ no no. Na Amnon see no dɛ
"Na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: osiandɛ bɔn kɛse a edze repam me yi omuo sen kor no a edze yɛɛ me no. Na ɔammpɛ dɛ otsie no."

column2: "Nna ɔfrɛɛ n'akowaa a ɔsom no no
column4: Yi ɔbaa yi edzi fi me nkyɛn pue
column5: na tow no abow no ekyir krɔkrɔw."

column2: "Nna ɔhyɛ asaasaaba atar bi: na dɛm mbataker no na ɔhen ne mbabaa a wɔyɛ mbaabun no no wɔhyehyɛe. Na n'akowaa no dze no puei
column3: na ɔtoow no abow no ekyir krɔkrɔw."

column2: "Na Tamar tuu nso guu n'etsifi
column3: na osunsuaan n'asaasaaba atar a ɔhyɛ no no mu; na ɔdze ne nsa guu n'etsifi
column5: mbrɛ ɔrokɔ no nna ɔrekeka mu."

column2: "Na no nua Absalom bisaa no dɛ
column3: Ana wo nua Amnon aba wo nkyɛn anaa? Afei m'akyerɛbaa
column4: mua w'ano: ɔyɛ wo nua; mma mmfa asɛm yi nnto w'akoma mu. Nna Tamar tsenaa no nua Absalom fie bɔmm."

column2: "Na aber a ɔhen David tsee nsɛm yi nyinara no
"Na Absalom annkasa papa anaa bɔn annkyerɛ Amnon: na Absalom taan Amnon
column3: ɔnam dɛ ɔahyɛ n'akyerɛbaa Tamar ntsi."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe ebien ekyir no
column3: nna Absalom wɔ nguansusuafo wɔ Baal-hazor a ɔwɔ Efraim nkyɛn mu: na Absalom hyiaa ɔhen ne mbabanyin no nyinara."

column2: "Na Absalom baa ɔhen no nkyɛn
column7: na no nkowaa nye w'akowaa nkɔ."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see Absalom dɛ
column6: ɔno bɛyɛ na yɛaayɛ adzesoa ama wo. Na ɔhyɛɛ no: naaso oennya no ma ɔannkɔ

column2: "Nna Absalom see dɛ
column5: ma mo nua Amnon nye hɛn nkɔ. Na ɔhen no see no dɛ
column6: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔnye wo nkɔ?"

column2: "Na Absalom hyɛɛ no araa ma ɔmaa Amnon na ɔhen ne mbabanyin no nyinara nye no kɔree."
"Na Absalom hyɛɛ no nkowaa no
column5: sɛ Amnon n'akoma nya nsa mu enyigye
column9: mma hom nnsuro: ana nnyɛ mara na mahyɛ hom bi? Hom nya akokodur

column2: "Na Absalom no nkowaa no yɛɛ Amnon dɛ mbrɛ Absalom hyɛe no ara. Nna ɔhen ne mbabanyin no nyinara soɛrsoɛree
column3: na nyimpa biara fowee tsenaa n'asoaso do guanee."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a wɔwɔ ɔkwan mu no
column4: nna nsɛm no dur David nkyɛn
column6: Absalom eku ɔhen ne mbabanyin no nyinara
column7: na hɔn mu baako mpo annka."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no soɛree
column4: na ɔdaa famu; na no nkowaa no nyinara so tsetsew hɔn ntar mu gyinagyinaa no ho."

column2: "Na Jonadab
column3: David no nua Simea ba no
column5: Mma mma mo wura nsusu dɛ woekum ɔhen ne mbabanyin mberantsɛ no nyinara; na Amnon nko na oewu: na ɔnam Absalom ne nhyehyɛɛ do na iyi wɔabɔ no pɔw fi da no a ɔhyɛɛ n'akyerɛbaa Tamar no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei mma mma mo wura ɔhen mmfa asɛm no nnto n'akoma mu
column3: dɛ ɔbɔdwen dɛ ɔhen ne mbabanyin no nyinara ewuwu: na Amnon nko na oewu."

column2: "Na Absalom dze oguanee. Na aberantsɛ ɔweɔmfo no maa n'enyi do
column6: nyimpa pii nam ɔkwan a ɔwɔ koko nkyɛnmu wɔ n'ekyir no mu reba."

column2: "Na Jonadab see ɔhen no dɛ
column4: ɔhen ne mbabanyin no reba: mbrɛ w'akowaa see no

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ owiee kasa no ara
column5: ɔhen no ne mbabanyin no bae
column7: na wosui: na ɔhen no so na no nkowaa no nyinara suu pii."

column2: "Na Absalom dze oguanee na osii mu kɔr Gesurhen Talmai
column3: Ammihur ne babanyin no nkyɛn. Na David gyaam ne ba no daa nyina."

column2: "Nna Absalom guanee
"Na ɔhen David ne kra no kɔn dɔɔ dɛ obefir akɔ Absalom nkyɛn: osiandɛ no werɛ akyekyer wɔ Amnon ho
